subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: After the Indianapolis 500, Busch aims to fly in a carefully organized sequence of helicopters and private planes to the 600-mile Nascar Sprint Cup event in North Carolina.
snippet: After the Indianapolis 500, Busch aims to fly in a carefully organized sequence of helicopters and private planes to the 600-mile Nascar Sprint Cup event in North Carolina.
